interactive_mr_approval_workflow.overview: MANDATORY INTERACTIVE APPROVAL: This workflow enforces individual approval for each MR feedback item rather than batch approval. Every feedback item must be presented individually with full context, and the user must explicitly approve or skip each item before any implementation occurs.
